ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package corn tortillas, cut into 6 wedges each

cookingTips: Heat oil to 350Â°F before frying for crispy chips without excessive oil absorption
Don't crowd the pot; fry tortillas in batches for even cooking
Drain on paper towels and salt while still hot for best flavor and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Homemade tortilla chips are easy and fresher than store-bought. Are you comfortable managing oil temperature and working with hot oil safely?
